post_detail.description: Click 3X is proud to have contributed to the highest rated broadcast in US Television history in this year's Super Bowl.  Working with CBS Sports, our team created an all-new NFL animation package that reflects all of the beauty, star power and suspense of America's favorite sport. This NFL on CBS in-game toolkit, included logo, image, and game packaging, and will be adopted moving forward with the 2013-2014 season as CBS' main NFL animation package.
post_detail.title: Super Bowl 2013
